summary: Conversion of armors to UNP BBP with gravity affect
descriptionHtml:
[color=blue][u][heading] Armor Gravity Conversion for UNPB-BBP [/heading][/u][/color]

[b][u]Description[/u][/b]
This is a conversion of different armors found on nexus (right now only a little sexy apparel\'s - mage apprentice) to the UNPB body with BBP skeleton. 

My overall goal is to have skirts with different weights added to them to produce a better illusion of gravity. This does produce some small clipping at the very end of the skirt when crouched but I find it much better than the defiance of gravity and hopefully I can find a way to mitigate this.

[b][u]Changelog[/u][/b]
[list]
[*]v0.1 - added MageApprentice w/ first person
[/list]
[b][u]Known Issues[/u][/b]
Mage Apprentice - has the arms and legs covered with extra cloth the only issue is clipping when wearing braces/boots (this is with any default or custom skyrim armor that goes beyond the elbow/knees with its mesh.

[b][u]Installation[/u][/b]
[list][*]Option 1 - Install BBP and then UNP body then install my mod. Standard UNP body will work but going from naked to equipped you may notice an increase in certain spots the closer you get to 100 weight.

[*]Option 2 - Install UNPB with BBP and then my mod. The UNPB body was used to create the mesh so the weights will be more accurate to this than the standard UNP. [/list]

[b][u]Uninstall[/b][/u]
  Just remove the armor/cloth torso meshes. Right now only data/meshes/clothes/mageapprentice

[b][u]Credits and Thanks[/u][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899]dimon99 and calyps and xp32 - UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB - BBP [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5564]Cotyounoyume - a little sexy apparel replacer - for CBBE and UNP [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]dimon99 - UNP Body[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888]CherryHotalin - CHSBHC - BBP and her fantastic tutorials[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19249]Nightasy - fantastic armor tutorials[/url]
author: Geko4515
